title: Is Our President Compromised by His Own Son? | 7/21/22
description:
Glenn monologues on where we are as a society with the collapse of our military, woke high-ranking officials, and our worsening oil dependency. Why is President Biden enabling his son's illegal and obsessive behavior? Glenn explains why he believes Hunter Biden might be blackmailing his father. Glenn exposes the ATF and its attack on Second Amendment rights and explains what you need to do if confronted. Glenn and Pat dissect President Biden's press conference regarding climate change and the upcoming executive actions he plans on taking. Becky Hope is a mom whose children's school district has been taken over by the DOJ. Glenn presents the first Badge of Merit award to a veteran helping people struggling with addiction.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
